clinical_study.brief_title: Registry of Acute Coronary Syndrome From University Hospital of Vigo
clinical_study.official_title: Registry of Patients Admitted by Acute Coronary Syndrome to University Hospital of Vigo

brief_summary.textblock: CardoCHUVI registry was aim to study ischemic and bleeding complication after an acute coronary syndrome (ACS), both in-hospital and follow-up events.

detailed_description.textblock:
CardioCHUVI is a retrospective study aim to analyze all consecutively patients admitted by acute coronary syndrome to University Hospital Alvaro Cunqueiro of Vigo, between January 2010 to January 2018
The objective of the project was to study cardiac and bleeding complications, such as reinfarction, heart failure, atrial fibrillation, stroke, and bleeding events, together with all-cause and cardiac mortality

primary_outcome.time_frame: Through study completion, an average of 3 years

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Through study completion, an average of 3 years
Through study completion, an average of 3 years
secondary_outcome.description: Any bleeding according to BARC definition (from 1 to 5)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Through study completion, an average of 3 years
Through study completion, an average of 3 years
Through study completion, an average of 3 years
Through study completion, an average of 3 years

intervention.description: Compare bleeding and ischemic events according to the type and duration of dual antiplatelet therapy

study_pop.textblock: Consecutive patients admitted by acute coronary syndrome in the University Hospital Alvaro Cunqueiro of Vigo between January 2010 to January 2018

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Any patient admitted to University Hospital Alvaro Cunqueiro of Vigo for acute coronary syndrome.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Secondary acute coronary syndromes during a hospital admission for another cause (i.e. acute myocardial infarction in the context of a sepsis)

overall_official.affiliation: University Hospital Álvaro Cunqueiro, Vigo, Spain
University Hospital Álvaro Cunqueiro, Vigo, Spain
University Hospital Álvaro Cunqueiro, Vigo, Spain

facility.name: Department of Cardiology, Hospital Álvaro Cunqueiro

clinical_study.keyword: Acute Coronary Syndrome; Bleeding; Dual antiplatelet therapy

patient_data.ipd_description: Registry of all consecutive patients admitted by acute coronary syndrome (ACS) to an university hospital in order to analyze bleeding and ischemic complications according to the type and duration of dual antiplatelet therapy
